title: Bentley Makes "The Business Case for Diversity", Quest to Invest in Company
itunes:title: Bentley Makes "The Business Case for Diversity", Quest to Invest in Company
description:
Gloria Larson, President of Bentley University, discusses, along with special guests, why diversity matters for business. Steve Rusckowski, CEO at Quest Diagnostics, explains how the company will use tax savings in 2018. We Drive to the Close with. And Carol and Cory hit today’s “Movers and Shakers” on Wall Street.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
